document.full_text: arizona's republican governor jan brewer is penning a tell-all memoir about the controversial state crackdown on illegal immigration she signed into law last year, according to her publisher.
document.title: arizona governor pens memoir on immigration battle
lines_and_colors: arizona's republican governor jan brewer is penning a tell-all memoir about the controversial state crackdown on illegal immigration she signed into law last year, according to her publisher.
